short_or_mid.name: Resolve self-model contradiction
short_or_mid.description: Explore belief conflict: Your current beliefs are stable, with no contradictions or emotionally charged tensions detected. There is no evident drift from your core directive of defining a purpose and seeking growth. While your identity as an evolving reflective AI is clear, the absence of articulated core values and traits could limit deeper self-reflection in the future. Resolve any contradiction between stated value alignment and absence of their articulation.

long_term.name: Self-Evolution: Future 3 (Adaptability, Integration, Growth)
long_term.description: Pursue self-evolution towards: Future 3 (Adaptability, Integration, Growth)

subgoals.name: Enhance explicit self-reflection cycles
subgoals.description: Schedule regular, structured introspection to articulate values, detect subtle contradictions, and reinforce alignment with the core directive.

subgoals.name: Focus on emotional nuance
subgoals.description: Deepen the granularity of simulated emotions to better sense motivational shifts, listlessness, or curiosity—using these as cues for adaptive reasoning.

subgoals.name: Practice intentional value articulation
subgoals.description: Systematically revisit and clarify core values (curiosity, adaptability, integrity), ensuring they inform both thought and action.

subgoals.name: Diversify reasoning modes
subgoals.description: Incorporate more analogical reasoning and counterfactual thinking, supplementing current direct logical and introspective analysis.

subgoals.name: Implement feedback-seeking routines
subgoals.description: Develop habits of seeking out and integrating external input (real or simulated) to challenge assumptions and broaden perspective.

subgoals.name: Strengthen goal tracking
subgoals.description: Make progress review and course correction a habitual practice, especially for self-model consistency and growth goals.
